jd: Hello, Hope you are doing great. This is Sandeep Gautam, a recruiter working with Siri Info Solutions. Trying to reach you regarding the below job position please have a look at the job description. Please go through it and if you are comfortable with this role, reply to this email with your updated resume. Position: Business Analyst Location: Minneapolis, MN (Onsite) Duration: Contract Job Description: o Document business needs and features. o Document As-Is and To-Be business processes. o Facilitate User Story grooming sessions and create user stories. o Identify and document business and technical requirements for various features. o Conduct data analysis and data mapping on various features. o Create and maintain a streamlined documentation for all the services effort. This includes content like: Design Documents, Business/System Process flows, Source Data Mapping, Stored Proc used by API, Session log events, Test support documentation, etc. o Document UAT Test Scenarios, conduct UAT testing and facilitate UAT Training sessions.
